item.title: 1 line of code How to reverse all words of a string
item.description: 1 const reverseWords = (str) => str.split(" ").map((word) => [...word].reverse().join("")).join(""); Returns the string with all words reversed Improved version with unicode support 1 const reverseWords = (str) => str.replace(/(\p{L}+)/gu, (word) => [...word].reverse().join('')); The repository and npm package You can find the all the utility functions from this series at github.com/martinkr/onelinecode The library is also published to npm as @onelinecode for your convenience.
